forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers this afternoon. High 14C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this morning will give way to occasional showers during the afternoon. High 58F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm. Locally heavy rainfall possible.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 51F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Locally heavy rainfall possible.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. Slight chance of a rain shower. High near 15C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 58F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low near 10C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low around 50F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with a steady, soaking rain later in the day. Increasing winds. High 14C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then becoming windy with a steady rain in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with periods of rain. Low around 10C. Winds S at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. Low around 50F. Winds S at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming less numerous later in the day. High 13C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 9C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 48F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 7C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low around 45F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 10C. Winds WNW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 51F. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low 6C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 44F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 54F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 44F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High near 55F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 44F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High around 55F. E winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 15 mph.
